author: 𝕭𝖆𝖜𝖗𝖆𝖆 𝖒𝖆𝖓𝖓 ♡
text: My problem with the show isn't the track but how they execute it. The writing & editing has been bad lately & that scares me more. Hope they don't mess it up with this one. 2 women fighting for a man always works in ITV so here we are lol. Kya hi kar sakte hain. #imlie  #Arylie

author: 𝕭𝖆𝖜𝖗𝖆𝖆 𝖒𝖆𝖓𝖓 ♡
text: Y does everyone have a problem with Aru having an ex?? Imlie had one so what if Aru has one too?? Lol. There's a reason why an Ex is an Ex. It's past which has no relevance in ur present & future unless u want it. Imlie is Aru's love & priority now & that's what matters. #imlie

author: 𝕭𝖆𝖜𝖗𝖆𝖆 𝖒𝖆𝖓𝖓 ♡
text:
So in Aru's absence Jyoti manages to manipulate Imlie into believing that her & ASR were a thing in the past so our bholi ladki would feel she's a kabab mein haddi for these two lovers🤡mission reunite do bichhade premi. Pati se to pucchlo behen use pyar tha bhi ya nhi.
